CommentBody:
Using Google Translate we had a remote session where I explained how partitions work and how to easily see filtered logs from reports and analysis.
He did not like the fact that for a timeframe of a month from the 1st to the 31st or 30th, he has multiple partitions, and the logs are not shown from all partitions for that timeframe.
I provided an alternative by exporting the filtered logs and then merging the files to have just one.
The customer will test some more and let me know.
